answerText: The Unbearable Bassington[10] When William Came and The Unbearable Bassington are the only two novels of this writer, better known for his short stories such as The Interlopers as well as stories featuring Reginald.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Brown University and Notre Dame | 14 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Henry Greech makes arrangements for the title character to become a soldier in West Africa, but he dies of malaria to the dismay of his mother Francesca. FTPE: [10] Identify this novel about the titular intolerable son named Comus.
